article_title: Kasich seeking sweet spot of campaign
article_text:

article_metadata.description: John Kasich’s ability to walk a political tightrope will go a long way toward determining his fate in today’s South Carolina primary and higher-stakes GOP presidential contests in coming weeks. The Ohio governor is holding himself out as a positive campaigner, yet he says he won’t be a marshmallow and thus feels free to counterpunch.
